issue.title: Parts of stereo camera system transforms are wrong

content.raw:
The frame names of both cameras have to be the same, otherwise stereo_image_proc will assert with "Assertion `left_.tfFrame() == right_.tfFrame()' failed.".

This is also how the stereo system is set up on the PR2:
https://code.ros.org/trac/wg-ros-pkg/browser/stacks/pr2_common/trunk/pr2_description/urdf/sensors/stereo_camera.urdf.xacro

I still get Pointclouds that are projected behind the robot head, though, so there's still something amiss, even after setting the frame of the right camera to be the same as the one of the left camera.
